item.description:
Join us for our October South Shore Dining Meetup!

Instead of hiding from your superstitions, spend your Friday the 13th making new friends and eating good food. Then after dinner, we can visit Barrett's Haunted Mansion.

The Haunted Mansion is optional. Please come even if you do not want to go to the mansion.

When and Where:
Friday, October 13th at 7:00 pm
Abington Ale House and Barrett's Haunted Manshion
1235 Bedford St (Rt. 18)
Abington, MA

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

Organizer: Jennifer

Please see our "About" page for full details.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.


***Please Note: RSVP's must be finalized by noon on October 13th as we have to finalize our reservation with the restaurant.***

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group October Meetup!
